summary: Five high school cheerleaders, their coach and a couple of adolescent sex-crazed guys travel to a cabin in the woods for a weekend getaway only to be killed off one by one by an unseen maniac.
cast: Tamie Sheffield|Charity Rahmer|Erin Byron|Lenny Juliano|William Langlois|Samantha Phillips|GiGi Erneta|April Flowers|Nikki Fritz|Tylo Tyler|Brad Beck|Summer Williams|Brinke Stevens|Melissa Brasselle|Julie Corgill|Steve Mitchell|Rob Sanchez|David Summers|Rikki Ray|John Colton|James A. Foster|Jesse Miller|Sarah Baker|Jim Wynorski|Ashley Blanco|Julie K. Smith|Regina Russell Banali|Dana Pine
title: Cheerleader Massacre
